Name: MAGIC WEAPON
Description: Voutouchanonmagical weapon. Untilthespellends,thatweaponbecomes amagicweaponwitha+1bonustoattackrollsanddamage rolls.At Higher LeveIs. Whenyoucastthisspellusingaspellslotof4thleveiorhigher,thebonusincreases to+2.Whenyouuseaspellslotof6thleveIorhigher,thebonusincreases to+3.
